product_name: Ultrathon SUN-50ST Sunscreen Stick - SPF 50 - 0.5 oz. - 2014 Closeout
long_description: Use the Ultrathon SUN-50ST UPF 50 Sunscreen Stick for quick applications of sun protection while you're hiking and traveling. Broad-spectrum sunscreen protects against sunburn with high UVB protection and protects against the effects of aging and skin damage with high UVA protection. Ultrathon SUN-50ST UPF 50 Sunscreen Stick is water resistant for up to 40 min. Closeout.
short_description: Use the Ultrathon SUN-50ST UPF 50 Sunscreen Stick for quick applications of sun protection while you're hiking and traveling.
